decision_conditions: The proposed development would fail to provide an appropriate mix of dwelling sizes, in particular dwellings with three or more bedrooms and as a result, is contrary to the aims of meeting objectively assessed housing needs and fostering mixed and inclusive neighbourhoods. The proposal is therefore contrary to policy H10 of the London Plan 2021 and policy DM13 of the LDF Core Strategy 2012.
